thread.title: Great Hotel for the money!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel for the money! - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JEThompson69
title: Great Hotel for the money!
text: This hotel is centrally located to the Times Square/Broadway area. We walked all over the city and felt this hotel was in a good location. Hotel is clean and rooms are nice. I'm not a fan of down pillows so I would have preferred an option for foam or something different, but that's just personal preference.
